cases.title: Urology Expert Witness Allowed to Testify In Product Liability Case
cases.description: A Urology Expert Witness was allowed to testify on the instructions for the use of a Gynecase TVT device.

cases.title: Psychology Expert Witness Excluded from Testifying in Insurance Matter
cases.description: The court ruled a Psychology Expert Witness could not testify on neuropsychological issues involving an insurance claim.

cases.title: Forensic Accounting Expert Witness Testifies in Business Dispute
cases.description: In a case involving the alleged theft of customers, a Forensic Accounting Expert Witness was allowed to testify on damages issues.
